#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

int main()
{
    string s,s1,s2;
    ll L,R,i,j;
    ll z[100005],t,n,m,k;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m>>k;
        cin>>s1;
        cin>>s2;
        s= s2.substr(0,k) + '$' + s1;
        //cout<<s<<endl;
        
        n=s.length();
         L = 0, R = 0;
         z[0]=0;
        for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
          if (i > R) { L = R = i;
            while (R < n && s[R-L] == s[R]) R++;
            z[i] = R-L; R--;} else {int k = i-L;
            if (z[k] < R-i+1) z[i] = z[k];
            else {L = i;
              while (R < n && s[R-L] == s[R]) R++;
              z[i] = R-L; R--;
            }}}
		int ans=0;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        {
        	if(z[i]==k)ans++;
        }
        if(ans==0)cout<<"-1"<<endl;
        else   cout<<ans<<endl;

    }

 return 0;
}
